name: do you mind bugs
description:
You need to get out of here...

Not only are you trapped in this maze of apartment rooms, bugs have escaped from your mind and infested the place...

Explore the sprawling apartment space.  Gain new abilities from your personality bugs. Collect emotion bugs to alter your emotional state and capabilities. Fight off enemy mind bugs with your abilities.  Find a way out...

Controls:

Movement: WASD keys

Brush Slash: O key

Food Projectile: P key

Main Credits:

Art: Thurmann Pangilinan

Programming: Wyatt Hawes

Level Design: Thurmann Pangilinan, James Clark

Sound Design: Thurmann Pangilinan, Wyatt Hawes

(Additional credits included at the end of the game.)
